resources.string:
<style media=\"screen\" type=\"text/css\">
            body {
                color: ?resources/body ;
            }
            a:link {
                color: ?resources/a_link ;
            }
            a:active {
                color: ?resources/a_active ;
            }
            a:visited {
                color: ?resources/a_visited ;
            }
        </style>
